LanguageData.ForsakenUndeathRot.label: plague of undeath
LanguageData.ForsakenUndeathRot.description: Poison in the bloodstream. This can come from various sources, including environmental toxins, venomous bites, or poisoned weapons. \nAt high doses, toxic buildup is lethal. Even at low doses, it can generate cancers. \nCreatures who die with toxic buildup cannot be eaten.
LanguageData.ForsakenUndeathRot.stages.0.label: initial
LanguageData.ForsakenUndeathRot.stages.1.label: initial
LanguageData.ForsakenUndeathRot.stages.2.label: minor
LanguageData.ForsakenUndeathRot.stages.3.label: moderate
LanguageData.ForsakenUndeathRot.stages.4.label: serious
LanguageData.ForsakenUndeathRot.stages.5.label: extreme
